Contact Us
Muddy Waters would love to hear from you. Please feel free to contact us by email through the form below. Please allow 24 hours for reply. If you need faster service, please call us at the number on this page.
Get in Touch

That data is being printed as a workaround to page builders reordering the order of the scripts loaded
Contact

Deerfield, FL 33442

(954) 428-6577
Hours of Operation
Sunday – Thursday 11 AM to 9 PM
Friday & Saturday 11 AM to 10 PM
Contact Us
Muddy Waters would love to hear from you. Please feel free to contact us by email through the form below. Please allow 24 hours for reply. If you need faster service, please call us at the number on this page.

About Us
Muddy Waters is the place to go in Deerfield Beach for the best lobster, fresh seafood and the island vibe. We have two separate dining areas, two unique bars, privacy or social interaction and Muddy’s outside covered patio seating.
FLORIBBEAN CUISINE
Muddy’s extraordinary and sometimes pirated recipes are made in house with the finest of fresh ingredients. Try our fresh seafood, meats, chowders, soups and sauces. Our quality is unsurpassed, and we take pride in being able to give you the best value.
BEST DRINKS IN DEERFIELD
Sit back and enjoy our unique island themed atmosphere, friendly staff and great Happy Hour daily!!!
Slip into island mode. Relax for a moment, and let us captain the helm.
LOYALTY ROYALTY CLUB
Ah, the benefits of Loy Roy… Becoming a Loyalty Royalty member is easy and rewarding!!! Just sign up the next time you dine in. We’ll be happy to activate your Muddy Waters Loyalty Royalty card so you can start acquiring points for food and beverage purchases.
Reviews
What Our Customers Say …
“Awesome”
“Muddy’s has the best atmosphere! So much to look at. I see a new decoration every time I go in there… and their food is awesome!”
Carey T.
via Urbanspoon
“Favorite”
“A favorite vacation destination! we go there as soon as we arrive in Boca Raton!”
Patricia M.
via Facebook
“Yummy”
“Great local bar/restaurant! Yummy food, cheap drinks, and friendly staff.”
Melissa L.
via Facebook
“Delicious”
“I adore the look of the place, very cute! And the food is very delicious. Definitely a must to do back!!!”
May B.
via Google
